tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transportation_costs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transportation_mode STRING,
  distance FLOAT,
  cost FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE transportation_costs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    description VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE transportation_modes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mode_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE transportation_routes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(50),
    distance DECIMAL(10, 2),
    start_location VARCHAR(100),
    end_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE transportation_providers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_person VARCHAR(100),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE historical_transportation_costs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255),
    transport_mode VARCHAR(50),
    distance FLOAT,
    cost DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE cost_saving_opportunities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255),
    potential_savings DECIMAL(10,2),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE transportation_routes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255),
    starting_location VARCHAR(100),
    ending_location VARCHAR(100),
    distance FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE transportation_modes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transport_mode VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255),
    transport_mode VARCHAR(50),
    distance FLOAT,
    cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    date DATE
)
